briefdescription.para: This function contains the working logic of the elevator array function for dynamic release.

detaileddescription.para: @detail Contains the logic for the dynamic version. It contains the main logic loop for travel of elevators .The loop for placing passengers on floors and the complete flow of the program. Plus additional functional calls for the dynamic release.

inbodydescription.para: A boolean array that shows if elevator needs to stop at a floor. to pick a passenger.
Array to pointer of type passenger. Stores passengers on floors.
stores the passengers from input file.
A queue of request made by passengers

briefdescription.para: This file contains the definition of dynamic_simulation The function contains the algorithm for dynamic release of the program.
